name: legal_tools
description: Read case docs, create filings, manage deadlines.

tools.name: fetch_case_docs
tools.description: Retrieve all documents for a specific case
tools.sql: select * from public.doc_store where case_id = :case_id order by created_at desc

tools.name: draft_filing
tools.description: Create a draft filing for a case
tools.sql: insert into public.filings (case_id, title, body, status) values (:case_id, :title, :body, 'draft') returning id

tools.name: set_deadline
tools.description: Set a deadline for a case
tools.sql: insert into public.deadlines (case_id, due_at, note) values (:case_id, :due_at, :note) returning id
